privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: We at Aetheris take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our service.

section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
section2.item1: Authentication information: we use OAuth2 for Google sign-in. We only store a hash of your email address, not the address itself, to ensure maximum security
section2.item2: Profile information: name, bio, avatar, and other information you voluntarily provide
section2.item3: Content: articles, comments, and other content you post
section2.item4: Technical information: IP address, browser type, service usage data

section3.title: 3. How We Use Information
section3.content: We use the collected information to:

section4.title: 4. Data Protection
section4.content: We employ modern encryption and security methods to protect your data. Your email address is stored only as a hash, making it impossible to recover even in the event of a data breach.

section5.title: 5. Information Sharing
section5.content: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties, except when necessary to provide services, required by law, or with your explicit consent.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.content: You have the right to request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data at any time. You may also opt out of receiving marketing messages.

section7.title: 7. Cookies
section7.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve service functionality, analyze usage, and personalize content. You can manage cookie settings in your browser.

section8.title: 8. Policy Changes
section8.content: We may periodically update this Privacy Policy. We will notify you of significant changes by posting a new version on this page.

privacyPolicy.contact: For privacy-related questions, please contact us at hello@aetheris.dev
